original_text: Did I fear a great multitude, or did the contempt of families terrify me, that I kept silence, and went not out of the door?
korean_text: 내가 언제 큰 무리와 여러 종족의 수모가 두려워서 대문 밖으로 나가지 못하고 잠잠하였던가

sentences.original_text: Did I fear a great multitude?
or did the contempt of families terrify me?
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 가문들의 경멸이 나를 두렵게 했더냐?

sentences.original_text: and went not out of the door?
